ざる得ない: (ざるえない) - cannot help (doing); have no choice but to
ざる蕎麦: (ざるそば) - zaru soba (soba served on a bamboo draining basket with dipping sauce)
ざわざわ: (ざわざわ) - noisy; sound of people talking
ざわつく: (ザワつく) - to be noisy (e.g. from people talking); to be discomposed (e.g. feelings)
ざんざめく: (ざざめく) - to be boisterously noisy
ざんちょ: (ざんちょ) - late summer heat; lingering summer heat
ざんばら髪: (ざんばらがみ) - loose and disheveled hair
しい: (しい) - shh! (used to silence someone)/sh!; shoo! (used to drive off an approaching animal, etc.); (after a noun, the -nai stem of a verb, or repetitive syllables) -ish/-like/-looking
しいさあ: (しし) - (しーしー and しし are col.)  Okinawan lion (or lion dog) statues, placed as talisman against evil at entrances and on roofs
しいの木: (シイノキ) - any beech tree of genus Castanopsis
しいみい: (しいみい) - tomb sweeping festival (Okinawa, April 4th or 5th)
しいん: (シーン) - silently (as the grave); quietly (as in death)
しぇえ: (しぇえ) - (said while holding a specific pose) holy moly; holy cow; whoa; wow
しおらしい: (しおらしい) - meek; gentle; modest; sweet
しか: (しか) - (used with neg. verb) only; nothing but
しかしも案山子もない: (しかしもカカシもない) - (resp. when other party is equivocating, such as saying しかし) stop complaining; stop making excuses
しかと: (シカト) - ostracism; ignoring someone; leaving someone out
しかな: (しかな) - (at sentence-end, usu. as 〜てしがな or 〜にしがな) I would like...; I want...
しかない: (しかない) - have no choice; there is nothing but; no more than
しかるが故に: (しかるがゆえに) - as such; that being so; for that reason
しかる上は: (しかるうえは) - now that it is as such; since it is as such
しかる後: (しかるのち) - thereafter; after doing that; followed by
しがな: (しかな) - (at sentence-end, usu. as 〜てしがな or 〜にしがな) I would like...; I want...
しくしく: (shikushiku) - chorando, soluçando, suavemente (chorando); com uma dor prolongada e surda, tendo uma dor cólica
しくしく泣く: (しくしくなく) - to sob; to weep
しくじる: (しくじる) - to fail; to fall through; to blunder
しくる: (しくる) - to fail; to stuff up
しけ込む: (しけこむ) - to slip into for the purposes of sex (e.g. lover's house, hotel, red light district, etc.)/to shack up with; to shut oneself away at home (due to lack of money)
しし: (しし) - (しーしー and しし are col.)  Okinawan lion (or lion dog) statues, placed as talisman against evil at entrances and on roofs
しし鍋: (ししなべ) - boar meat hot pot; boar stew
したい気がする: (したいきがする) - to feel like doing
したがる: (したがる) - to wish (to do)/to desire/to want; to be ready/to be eager
したたか者: (したたかもの) - strong-willed person/old hand/shrewd rascal/wily fox/desperate character/formidable woman; strong man/brave man
したり: (したり) - God bless me!; Good heavens!
した方がいい: (したほうがいい) - had better do so
しだれ桜: (シダレザクラ) - weeping cherry (Prunus spachiana); shidare cherry
しち面倒臭い: (しちめんどうくさい) - extremely bothersome; extremely tiresome; extremely troublesome; very tedious
しっかりしろ: (しっかりしろ) - pull yourself together; get a grip; get a hold of yourself; come on
しっかり者: (しっかりもの) - person of firm character; stable person; gutsy person
しっくり: (しっくり) - exactly/nicely/to a tee; to be fitting
しっくり行く: (しっくりいく) - to get on well with (someone)
しっちゃかめっちゃか: (シッチャカメッチャカ) - jumbled up; disordered; messy
しっぺ返し: (しっぺがえし) - returning tit for tat; retaliating
しっぽり: (しっぽり) - in a drenched manner/moistly; affectionately/fondly/tenderly; slowly/at ease/restful
しっぽを掴む: (しっぽをつかむ) - to have something on someone/to catch someone out/to trip someone up/to have evidence/to get a lead; to grab by the tail
しつこい: (しつっこい) - insistent/obstinate/persistent/tenacious; too rich (taste, etc.)/fatty/heavy/greasy
しつっこい: (しつっこい) - insistent/obstinate/persistent/tenacious; too rich (taste, etc.)/fatty/heavy/greasy
しつつある: (しつつある) - to be doing; to be in the process of doing
しつつ行なう: (しつつおこなう) - to be carrying out/to be in the process of carrying out; to be performing/to be in the process of performing
して: (して) - by (indicating means of action)/as (a group, etc.); (as 〜をして in modern Japanese) indicates patient of a causative expression; (after the ren'youkei form of an adjective) acts as a connective; (after an adverb or a particle) adds emphasis; and then
してからが: (してからが) - even; indicates something unexpected occurs
してみると: (してみれば) - then; in that case; considering; if that is the case; if so
してみれば: (してみれば) - then; in that case; considering; if that is the case; if so
してもいい: (してもいい) - do not mind doing; gladly do; can do; might as well do
してもよい: (してもいい) - do not mind doing; gladly do; can do; might as well do
して遣られる: (してやられる) - to be forestalled; to be taken in; to be cheated; to be outwitted
しとく: (しとく) - (contraction of ～しておく) to do in advance; to do as a preparation
しどろもどろ: (しどろもどろ) - flustered; confused; disordered; incoherent
しな: (しな) - (after the -masu stem of a verb) having just started...
しないのではないか: (ないのではないか) - I think (something) won't (something); probably (something) isn't (something)
しなしな: (しねしね) - soft and elastic; plexible; pliant
しなを作る: (しなをつくる) - to put on coquettish airs; to act flirtatiously; to act kittenish
しな垂れかかる: (しなだれかかる) - to lean coquettishly against; to snuggle into; to nestle into
しねしね: (しねしね) - soft and elastic; plexible; pliant
しのぎを削る: (しのぎをけずる) - to compete ruthlessly; to sharpen swords
しばおま: (しばおま) - (from しばらくお待ち下さい) please wait; one moment please
しばく: (しばく) - to strike (with a stick, whip, etc.); to hit/to punch/to kick/to beat; to go to (a place to eat, drink, etc.)
しばしば目: (しばしばめ) - blinking away tears; blinking tear filled eyes
しばらくしてから: (しばらくしてから) - after a while; a little while later; shortly afterward
しばらくの間: (しばらくのあいだ) - for a short while; for a while; for some time; for the time being
しばらく経ってから: (しばらくたってから) - after a while; a little while later; shortly afterward; after a brief interval
